ygData.subject: Re: tentacle terrors
ygData.msgSnippet: heh dont feel bad..23 and 30 are Awful levels! either the bad guy is too Red or Too Green ;-) But patience! ~    Auraelle Dracul      ~ ~Priestess of Veeshan~
ygData.messageBody:
heh dont feel bad..23 and 30 are Awful levels! either the bad guy is too Red
or Too Green ;-)

But patience!

~ Auraelle Dracul ~
~Priestess of Veeshan~
~ Follower of Tunare ~
~ Lords of Light ~

----- Original Message -----
From: Lim Dul <sevendegrees@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, July 23, 1999 8:56 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] tentacle terrors


> From: "Lim Dul" <sevendegrees@...>
>
> Ah, hehe. that's pretty good. Pretty much the same techniques then...I
> guess you are just braver than I am. :) I don't know what it is....but
> I've been having a real hard time getting to level 24. Spells that I've
> been relying on like Force shock are now fizzling like mad against the
> TTs...forcing me to run quite a bit.
>
> One TT alone did quite a number on me last night too...barely made it out
> alive. Some of my bad performance was probably attributed to the fact
that
> I'm trying to practice my long-dormant melee 1H Blunt skills . I'm a
really
> bad hitter. hehe
>
> I was so embarrassed last night because two normally easy blue and green
> Highhold gnolls killed me on sight. *sigh* 23 is a cursed level.
>
> -- Lim'Dul
>
> >Oh.. heh =)
>
> >Here's how I do it.. *shrugs* ...I invis at the entrance.. just so
>when
> >I'm
> >sitting there, the Ogre guard doesn't smack me.
>
> >I root one Terror.
>
